meanings.sent1: She teletyped the urgent message to the headquarters.
meanings.sent2: The office teletyped the report to the remote location.
meanings.sent3: The cat teletyped a secret message to the other animals.
meanings.sent4: His fingers teletyped the code with lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: The teletyped words danced across the screen.

meanings.definition: To send or receive messages by teletype.
meanings.sent1: He teletyped back a quick response to the inquiry.
meanings.sent2: They teletyped important updates to all branches.
meanings.sent3: The birds teletyped each other about the upcoming migration.
meanings.sent4: The news teletyped through the wires, spreading rapidly.
meanings.sent5: The teletyped messages flowed seamlessly between offices.
